duties_responsibilities.duty: Prototype, develop, and refine machine learning, deep learning, and NLP models on top of the ML platform.
Conduct experiments and evaluations to assess model performance and effectiveness, and develop metrics for use cases.
Implement and adapt models for real-time, scalable, and efficient performance, collaborating with ML Engineers.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and develop technical plans.
Implement robust and reusable data preprocessing and feature engineering pipelines to extract meaningful insights from raw data.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in machine learning, deep learning, and NLP, particularly as applied in healthcare.

education_certification.credential: Master's or PhD in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or a related quantitative field
